title: Sameeksha By Sachin - A Miracle of Nature
review: The Camel Rock is an amazing structure in the shape of Camel Back which can be seen from  the middle of Camel Back Road. We visited the place in the evening and it was little dark but we could manage to see the Camel Rock. Camel back  road is normally used by the local people for morning and evening walk. One can reach to the camel back road through Mall road. There is one road which goes up from mall road near rope way station to Cambridge book Depot and the road which is adjacent to Cambridge book depot, goes down to Camel back road. I would recommend this place to visit.

title: Nice Views of mountains
review: Camel rock not clearly visible from telescope. There were nice view of mountains from the place & walking distance from mall road.

title: Serene Long Walks
review: This is one attraction for which I can go to Mussoorie again. Its a beautiful long road with lovely views. There is a sant nirankari Ashram here also which sometimes disturbs the peace of this road with their speakers and crowd. There is a British Cemetery here too which is a must view. Few vehicles and horses ply on this road but its best to walk the road and enjoy serenity.

title: Amazing views
review: The mountains is green thickly covered with forest and white clouds make it look like wonderful creation of nature

title: Dont go for exactly for it, it can be an excuse to walk on a beautiful calm road
review: You will be disappointed if you had to spend time and money merely to see a rock known as Camel's Back as there is nothing special about it and you may even fail to spot it of your own. However, if you take the road leading to camel Rock you may enjoy views of mountains and things around.

title: HARDLY VISIBLE
review: I tried to see it, but could only see from the Picture books available for sale. Our Hotel was at Camel back only.

title: The peaks
review: Once it used to have horses. Now its paved and the horses have gone, leaving pedestrians and cars. This time we found people with binoculars pointing out the snow peaks. Rather rewarding experience.

title: Cannot even identify this
review: We would have walked on camel back road atleast 10 times but could not identify this landmark. It is hardly of any importance. Enjoy the weather in mussorie and forget these landmarks which are for guides and enthu tourist

title: weekend trip
review: same as camel back road. nice place for your morning or evening walk. very peaceful and substantially clean all around.

title: nice view
review: Nice little walk. The view is also what you see from the car, however its just like a short walk away from the buzy mall road which brings the change.

title: EXCELLENT Road for long walk, great weather
review: Its a great place to go for long walk, has excellent weather all year round, peaceful and serene.

title: just a view
review: hahahhahaha there is nothing like camel back like its name. Its a view which you would get when you reach this place.

title: Good viewpoint on Camels back road
review: The Camels back road, with one end at the Mall near Library end, makes for a great walking experience in Mussoorie.

title: great view
review: visit here early morning and you will feel good. great viewpoint on camels back road. in our 3 night stay in mussoorie we visited here 4 times.

title: Great walk in the late afternoon
review: 2.1 km from the library chowk. We three had a wonderful walk to and back along the camel back road in the late afternoon. Reached the area of the telescope around 5.45 pm. The charge is rs 30 per person. Worth it. You can see the rocks shaped in the form of the whole camel not just the camel back. Had a wonderful cup of tea at a small tea stall on the way back. The only negative were the intermittent bikes which were ridden at speeds not appropriate for such a narrow winding road.

title: Excellent walk with view
review: While walking down Camel's Back road, amongst the various sights is the Camel's Rock.

title: Hardly visible Camel Rock
review: One goes to the Camel's Back Road. There is aperson with a telescope. He shows through the telescope a rock (hardly visible) shaped like a camel. Utter waste of time.

title: a great long walk
review: if you want to enjoy visit early morning on camels back road. it is good view point but it is famous because it is on camels back road.

title: It’s waste of time
review: Nothing is der except shops  . Place is destroyed by commercialization .better to walk on mall road ..

title: What? Where?
review: Could hardly make out there was a rock there. Besides, we were expecting a camel's hump on the road. This was quite an anti climax. There is also no proper signage or place to sit. Highly disappointing.

title: Rock formation in the shape of a Camel.
review: You can see this interesting rock formation in the shape of a Camel from the Camel's back road of Mussoorie. Half way through this road the place is marked you can view it on top of the hill, through a telescope on payment. I believe you can climb to that point which needs some serious effort.

title: The rock that gives the road its name
review: This is the No-1 spot to see when on the Camel Back road. However it is best seen from a telescope and there are several shops where for a small fee you can see this rocky formation that gives this road its name- Camel back road

title: Excellent spot
review: This is an excellent spot in the shape of camel back.  you can view nice spots with telescopes there.
